author: Ken Dilanian
title: Coronavirus and its social effects fueling extremist violence, says government report
description: The coronavirus pandemic and its social repercussions are fueling violence by frustrated individuals and domestic terrorists, according to a new DHS report.
content:
WASHINGTON The coronavirus pandemic and its social repercussions are fueling violence by both frustrated individuals and domestic terrorists, according to a new intelligence report by the Department of Homeland Security obtained by NBC News.
The unclassified… [+3833 chars]
